data.system_settings: Macbook Pro 2015 Screen resolution: 15,4-inch (2880 x 1800), MacOS Sierra: Version 10.12.6
data.actual_result: The slider goes out of place
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to settings - Go to the tab Games - Press the slider so it goes to the on mode - Press escape at the same time - See the button go out of place
